body:
CMake since 3.15.3 requires libarchive 3.3.3 (previously it was 3.1.0).

This PR add the latest libarchive version and fixes the dependency in CMake.

Reference:
- https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/commit/752fa8be9d410907e1ecb80a6a21daacd1a666f9
- https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/blob/v3.15.2/CMakeLists.txt#L514
- https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/blob/v3.15.3/CMakeLists.txt#L514
title: Fix CMake and update libarchive
